titles.title: A bill to establish the Stonewall Jackson Lake National Recreation Area in the State of West Virginia and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, OMB, Corps of Engineers.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 10/6/1987--Introduced. Establishes the Stonewall Jackson Lake National Recreation Area, West Virginia. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire land and water interests. Directs the Secretary to administer such Area. Authorizes hunting, fishing, and trapping in such Area except in designated zones. Continues existing oil and gas extraction rights. Directs the Secretary to establish an advisory commission for such Area. Authorizes appropriations.
